import React from "react"; import OwlCarousel from "react-owl-carousel"; import "owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.carousel.css"; import "owl.carousel/dist/assets/owl.theme.default.css"; import ScreenHeading from "../../Utilities/ScreenHeading/ScreenHeading"; import ScrollService from "../../Utilities/scrollService"; import Animations from "../../Utilities/Animations"; import "./Testimonial.css"; import lady from "../../img/lady.png"; import mike from "../../img/mike.png"; import man from "../../img/man.png"; import shape from "../../img/shape-bg.png"; export default function Testimonial(props) { let fadeInScreenHandler = (screen) => { if (screen.fadeInScreen !== props.id) return; Animations.animations.fadeInScreen(props.id); }; const fadeInSubscription = ScrollService.currentScreenFadeIn.subscribe(fadeInScreenHandler); const options = { loop: true, margin: 0, nav: true, animateIn: "bounceInRight", animateOut: "bounceOutRight", dots: true, autoplay: true, smartSpeed: 1000, responsive: { 0: { items: 1, }, 768: { items: 1, }, 1000: { items: 3, }, }, }; return (
